enumerationCardProps.title: Select Plan
enumerationCardProps.description: Choose a subscription that suits your needs.

enumerationCardProps.title: Download NymVPN
enumerationCardProps.description: Download the NordVPN app on your device.

enumerationCardProps.title: Connect
enumerationCardProps.description: Log in and connect to the VPN server.

banner.title: Real privacy. In your hands.
text: Choose privacy protections based on your browsing needs: Pick lightning-quick speed with the dVPN or complete privacy with the mixnet, all in one app.

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.description: The fastest way to get answers to your questions is through our help center.

faqs.title: How do I know that NymConnect is secure?
faqs.description: Nym is a decentralized, open-source, anonymous overlay network and mixnet for the Internet. It is censorship-resistant and privacy-preserving by design.

faqs.title: Which payment methods will be accepted?
faqs.description: NymConnect will be accessible via a variety of payment methods including credit/debit cards, cash and cryptocurrencies. Zero-knowledge proof access will prevent from correlating the payment with the user credentials. [Learn more here](www.google.es).

faqs.title: When will the updated NymConnect be available?
